subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: What today’s young fan would find preposterous about 1970 is that there was no free network access to Game 7 of the N.B.A. finals in the home-team market.
snippet: What today’s young fan would find preposterous about 1970 is that there was no free network access to Game 7 of the N.B.A. finals in the home-team market.
